scripts.install:all: npm install && cd angular-app && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:angular && cp -r server dist/
scripts.start: npm run build:angular && node -r newrelic server/start.js --env-file=.env
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build:angular && concurrently "cd angular-app && npm run build -- --watch" "nodemon --env-file=.env server/start.js"
scripts.newrelic:deployment: USER=$(git config user.name) && CHANGELOG=$(git log --oneline -1) && COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && curl -X POST https://api.newrelic.com/graphql -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'API-Key: $NEW_RELIC_API_KEY' --data-raw '{"query":"mutation { changeTrackingCreateDeployment(deployment: {description: \"FoodMe Node.js Server Deployment\", user: \"'$USER'\", changelog: \"'$CHANGELOG'\", commit: \"'$COMMIT'\", deploymentType: BASIC}) { deploymentId } }"}'
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Please edit .env with your actual values'
scripts.validate:env: test -f .env && echo '✅ .env file exists' || echo '❌ .env file missing - run: npm run setup:env'
scripts.db:connect: docker compose exec db psql -U foodme_user -d foodme
scripts.db:backup: docker compose exec db pg_dump -U foodme_user foodme > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:restore: cat backup.sql | docker compose exec -T db psql -U foodme_user -d foodme
